title: Nvidia CEO pushes back against report that his company’s $100B OpenAI investment has stalled

title: OpenClaw’s AI assistants are now building their own social network
summary: The viral personal AI assistant formerly known as Clawdbot has a new shell — again. After briefly rebranding as Moltbot, it has now picked OpenClaw as its new name.

title: Anthropic brings agentic plug-ins to Cowork
summary: The company says you can use plug-ins to "tell Claude how you like work done, which tools and data to pull from, how to handle critical workflows, and what slash commands to expose so your team gets more consistent outcomes."

summary: This merger would bring the Grok chatbot, Starlink satellites, and SpaceX rockets together under one corporation.

summary: If a deal materializes, it would mean Amazon is backing competing startups in the race for AI supremacy.

title: How the sometimes-weird world of lifespan extension is gaining influence
summary: For the last couple of years, I’ve been following the progress of a group of individuals who believe death is humanity’s “core problem.” Put simply, they say death is wrong—for everyone. title: ChatGPT isn’t the only chatbot pulling answers from Elon Musk’s Grokipedia
summary: ChatGPT is using Grokipedia as a source, and it's not the only AI tool to do so. Data suggests that's on the rise, heightening concerns about accuracy and misinformation as Musk seeks to reshape […]

title: Video game company stock prices dip after Google introduces an AI world-generation tool
summary: The stock prices of some major video game companies, including Take-Two Interactive, Roblox, and Unity, had notable declines on Friday, just a day after Google announced its Project Genie tool that lets users prompt AI to generate interactive experiences, Reuters reports. Take-Two's stock price closed at $220.30 (down 7.93 percent from yesterday), Roblox's closed at […]

title: It’s a new heyday for gas thanks to data centers
summary: The US is now leading a global surge in new gas power plants being built in large part to satisfy growing energy demand for data centers. And more gas means more planet-heating pollution. Gas-fired power generation in development globally rose by 31 percent in 2025. Almost a quarter of that added capacity is slated for […]

title: Elon Musk might merge SpaceX with Tesla or xAI
summary: Elon Musk-led SpaceX may merge with another company helmed by Elon Musk. The merger would help with SpaceX's plans to launch data centers into space, according to the publication. Later on Thursday, […]

title: Apple’s second biggest acquisition ever is an AI company that listens to ‘silent speech’
summary: Apple's biggest acquisition ever is still its $3 billion Beats buy in 2014, but now the second biggest deal is bringing in Q.ai, a four-year-old AI audio startup. title: Half of developers think gen AI is bad for the gaming industry
summary: While generative AI is being adopted at various levels of game development, a new survey suggests that developers increasingly think the technology is bad for the industry. summary: Across Instagram and Facebook, AI-generated videos show people of color putting ICE agents in their place. Are they cathartic or just adding to a stew of misinformation?

title: An AI Toy Exposed 50,000 Logs of Its Chats With Kids to Anyone With a Gmail Account
summary: AI chat toy company Bondu left its web console almost entirely unprotected. Researchers who accessed it found nearly all the conversations children had with the company’s stuffed animals.

title: Data Centers Are Driving a US Gas Boom
summary: Gas projects in the US pipeline explicitly linked to data centers increased by almost 25 times over the past two years, according to new research from Global Energy Monitor.

summary: ICE has been using an AI-powered Palantir system to summarize tips sent to its tip line since last spring, according to a newly released Homeland Security document.
